column.name: fk_owner
column.comment: Foreign key to the owner of this item.

column.name: fk_wrapped_in
column.comment: Foreign key to the item in which this item is wrapped into.

column.name: fk_storage_bag
column.comment: ID to the bag into which this item is. NULL if this item is not stored in a bag.

column.name: fk_storage_type
column.comment: The type of the main storage. Foreign key to item_storage_type.

column.name: object_type
column.comment: The type of the object, flag based. The following masks are applied (and combined) on it to determine the exact object type: 1 - Object 2 - Item 4 - Container 8 - Unit 16 - Player 32 - Gameobject 64 - Dynamicobject 128 - Corpse

column.name: fk_object_entry
column.comment: Foreign key to the id of the original item_template.

column.name: object_padding
column.comment: The object padding. - Provide more info if known ! -

column.name: fk_creator_guid
column.comment: Foreign key to the creator of this item. It is used in case of crafted item.

column.name: fk_gift_guid
column.comment: Foreign key to the creator of this item. It is used in case of wrapped item.

column.name: duration
column.comment: The remaining time for this object. (in ms).

column.name: spell_charges1
column.comment: The number of remaining charges for the spell nr 1 of the item.

column.name: spell_charges2
column.comment: The number of remaining charges for the spell nr 2 of the item.

column.name: spell_charges3
column.comment: The number of remaining charges for the spell nr 3 of the item.

column.name: spell_charges4
column.comment: The number of remaining charges for the spell nr 4 of the item.

column.name: spell_charges5
column.comment: The number of remaining charges for the spell nr 5 of the item.

column.name: binded
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this item is bind or not.

column.name: unknown1
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unlocked
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this item is locked or not.

column.name: wrapped
column.comment: Flag value indicating whether this item is wrapped or not.

column.name: unknown4
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown5
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown6
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown7
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown8
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown10
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown11
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown12
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown13
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown14
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown15
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown16
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: unknown17
column.comment: This flag has an unknown meaning, please find me !

column.name: fk_dbc_perm_enchant_id
column.comment: Foreign key to the enchantment id of SpellItemEnchantement.dbc.

column.name: perm_enchant_duration
column.comment: Remaining time of the permanent enchantment.

column.name: perm_enchant_charges
column.comment: Remaining charges of the enchantement.

column.name: fk_dbc_temp_enchant_id
column.comment: Foreign key to the enchantment id of SpellItemEnchantement.dbc.

column.name: temp_enchant_duration
column.comment: Remaining time of the temporary enchantment.

column.name: temp_enchant_charges
column.comment: Remaining charges of the enchantement.

column.name: fk_dbc_prop0_enchant_id
column.comment: Foreign key to the enchantment id of SpellItemEnchantement.dbc.

column.name: property_seed
column.comment: Suffix factor.

column.name: fk_dbc_random_property_id
column.comment: Foreign key to the random property ID.

column.name: fk_item_text_id
column.comment: Foreign key to the item text.

column.name: durability
column.comment: The remaining durability for this item.

column.name: slot
column.comment: The slot in which this item is stored relative

column.name: stack_count
column.comment: Amount of object for this stack.

column.name: guild_petition_name
column.comment: The temporary guild name attached to the petition item.

column.name: fk_wrapped_in
column.comment: Foreign key to the item in which this item is wrapped into.

column.name: fk_storage_bag
column.comment: ID to the bag into which this item is. NULL if this item is not stored in a bag.

column.name: fk_petition
column.comment: Foreign key to the petition item that this character has signed.
